## TextAreaBuilderOptions.placeholder property

Placeholder text shown when textarea is empty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
placeholder?: string;
```

## Remarks

Displayed in a dimmed style when the textarea has no content. Disappears once the user starts typing. Uses `placeholderStyle` for styling.
